name: Matryoshka (fmbvisuals, fucciroberta, Alax00)
description:
In 2221, a  natural disaster makes the Earth inhabitable except for a small area. Humanity succeeds in preserving the race by building Matryoshka, a  worlds simulations facility: large environments contained in each room to stock human beings. A great starting point for humanity to survive but they soon realize that Matryoshka won’t last longer on the hostile Earth and get prepared to live in space. Unexpectedly, Matryoshka collapses. The evacuation protocol gets started and the player remains stuck inside. The objective is to walk through the testing simulation rooms to reach the shuttle and hopefully evacuate the Earth.

IMPORTANT: When the play start, wait a bit for the "Start Game" to load (the hovering effect will appear if the game is loaded).

Movement: WASD + Mouse
Sprint: Left SHIFT
Jump: SPACEBAR
Discard: DEL + Mouse click on item (press DEL again to close the discard action)
Action (Open doors, etc...): E
Flashlight ON/OFF: F
Heal: Q
Pause Game: ESCAPE

Team Name: Team Caballo

Team Members:  Francesco Maria Bernabei
